issue.title: [C++][R][CI] Enable use of sccache in cpp crossbow builds
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17021](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17021). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
sccache is ccache with a cloud storage back-end and allows us to circumvent the issue of cross branch caching in crossbow (not possible by design).
